description.@en: I’ve always had a knack for learning.

data.notes:
Commoner Trait

Professions of this Archetype are typically run-of-the-mill people, taking on regular jobs. Their occupations may vary by culture, but they live by the philosophy that hard work will ensure a bountiful, healthy and productive life.

effect.@en: Add +5% Base Chance to any Skill you don’t have a Skill Rank in.
